about the company's logistics and supply chain management software as a service. The service gives customers visibility over their global supply chains, with built-in analytics and reporting features. WinRumors said Microsoft would release the utilities in the coming months. The company has not confirmed the report. It's not the first time reports of Kinect software for Windows PCs have surfaced.
